review: The people were very helpful, however the fire tv stick stops constantly and has to start over.  I can't watch tv it stops and the youtube takes 20 minutes and then says it has to start over again.
author: Sukamu

review: This stick just buffered all the time and you couldn't watch anything without it constantly buffering.. was really annoying.  I think it is their Software in the programming of it.. since I have heard people complain that have 30MB of data speed and it didn't work.  So, I returned it.  Hope this helps.
author: K. Wells "Movie Buff"

review: This stick made the Amazon Prime features on my Vizio TV a lot easier.
author: Gerald Esquivel

review: Kodi runs perfectly find on this device, have 3 already on all tvs. I took off my cable service. This is all i need, if u have this install kodi (xbmc).
author: hazardnato

review: Better than my Roku and Apple TV. Easy to use and has all the must have apps.
author: Anthony D. Tagliamonte Jr.
